title: LAN to OCE Trasnfer unavailable?
body: I have a friend who has an acc thats with the region LAN but he can't trasnfer to Oce? Is there any way he can get the account to oce? is there a timeframe that oce is available to transfer?

replies.body:
Usually this occurs when regions aren't yet on the same patch. OCE gets stuff first (or close to) so generally around patch days some server transfers are unavailable until those regions catch up.

Not sure if this is the case here since I don't remember when the last patch was, but give it a day or two and it should be available again.

That said, it looks like OCE to LAN is available, so I don't see why LAN to OCE wouldn't be.
